imdb.plot outline: Mismated is a dramedy mini-series, illustrating the complexities of how communication can go wrong in relationships. Eddie Pyrell, The Pushover, has a picture perfect relationship with his girlfriend Melinda Belluci, The Princess. Eddie is a successful entrepreneur, and Melinda is a stylist, and together they live a happy and wealthy life. However, they realize when they go on a trip with their married friends, Renata Miles, The Workaholic, and Derek Johnson, The Tree Hugger, that their relationship isn't all that perfect, and success is not the only thing that matters in life. Throughout their journey they encounter unexpected obstacles and how they deal with these obstacles is what brings them closer together. We can only imagine what is yet to come.
imdb.title: Mismated
plot: The complexities of how communication can go wrong in relationships.::Anonymous

_Mismated_ (qv) is a dramedy mini-series, illustrating the complexities of how communication can go wrong in relationships. Eddie Pyrell, The Pushover, has a picture perfect relationship with his girlfriend Melinda Belluci, The Princess. Eddie is a successful entrepreneur, and Melinda is a stylist, and together they live a happy and wealthy life. However, they realize when they go on a trip with their married friends, Renata Miles, The Workaholic, and Derek Johnson, The Tree Hugger, that their relationship isn't all that perfect, and success is not the only thing that matters in life. Throughout their journey they encounter unexpected obstacles and how they deal with these obstacles is what brings them closer together. We can only imagine what is yet to come.::Anonymous
